sentence.Network_en: Two Atlantic walruses snuggle on an ice floe near Igloolik , Nunavut, Canada.
sentence.Network_cn: 加拿大努勒维特伊格卢利克附近,两头大西洋海象在浮冰上相互偎依.

sentence.Network_en: A large ice floe in the Arctic Ocean bears an icicle - trimmed cave.
sentence.Network_cn: 北冰洋上的一片巨大浮冰支撑起一个由冰柱装饰的洞窟.

sentence.Network_en: Two penguins are standing on ice floe.
sentence.Network_cn: 两只企鹅站在一块浮冰上.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent. (superseding flake in this sense): probably from Norwegian flo, from Old Norse fló 'layer'

means.word_mean: 1. a flat mass of ice (smaller than an ice field) floating at sea
